## PM.25 total emissions for Baltimore City

```{r echo=FALSE}
require(plotly)
require(dplyr)
NEI <- readRDS("summarySCC_PM25.rds")
NEI_sum <- subset(NEI, fips==24510) %>% group_by(year,type) %>% summarize(total_emissions=as.numeric(sum(Emissions)))
NEI_df <- as.data.frame(NEI_sum)

plot_ly(NEI_df, x=NEI_df$year, y=NEI_df$total_emissions, color=NEI_df$type, mode="lines")
```
